channel.title: How Do I Stop People From Attacking Shop Keepers With Magic?
channel.description:
How do I stop players on my server from attacking shop keepers or any shop for that matter? Please help! :(
[b]Server base:[/b] Phonescape

item.title: How Do I Stop People From Attacking Shop Keepers With Magic?
item.dc:creator: @KingCjownz KingCjownz
item.description:
@KingCjownz wrote:

Mod Nate:

well make the shopkeepers have a shitload of health and make them hit hella high when they atk the person atkin them…so its like an instant kill…

Shop keeper would move and chase after them with maby being poisoned.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Stop People From Attacking Shop Keepers With Magic?

item.title: How Do I Stop People From Attacking Shop Keepers With Magic?
item.dc:creator: @2pure4u 2pure4u
item.description:
@2pure4u wrote:

OK! Here is what you do, make a shop keeper, then make it if anyone tries to attack, make the shop keeper turn into a jad and p00n him silly, or eat him =]

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Stop People From Attacking Shop Keepers With Magic?

item.title: How Do I Stop People From Attacking Shop Keepers With Magic?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

If anything you would make the Shop Keepers’ have low HP. The faster they die the better, the more you attack them the more errors you get etc.

This is possible, if Jagex can do it, you can do it. It would be tough though, you’d have to get ideas from the tutorial section. Probably not worth the time.

Read full topic
